summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the levy of property taxes; amending the ordinance passed as Council Bill 113418 to levy additional regular property taxes upon all taxable property, both real and personal, in the City of Seattle; and in light of legal uncertainties surrounding State Initiative Measure 722 reaffirming, by a vote of a majority plus one, the City Council's finding of a substantial need to use, and use of, 106% as the regular property tax limit factor for taxes to be collected in 2001.
